casebody.data:
Wednesday, January 19, 2000

MERIT DOCKET

99-1445. Crittenden Court Apt. Assoc. L.P. v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 98-A-356. Sua sponte, cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Cook, J., would order appellant to show cause why this appeal should not be dismissed.
